reference.shortdesc: The bodydiv element contain blocks of sequential elements within the body of a topic.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The bodydiv element is a grouping element. The purpose of the element is to organize subsets of content into logical groups that do not contain a title. For content that requires a title, use a section element or a nested topic.
The bodydiv element can nest itself, thus it can be used as a specialization base. Another common use case for the bodydiv element is to group a sequence of related elements for reuse.
Because the bodydiv element allows section, it cannot be used within section elements. Use the div element to group content that might occur in both topic bodies and sections.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the bodydiv element can be used to group a sequence of elements for reuse:
example.codeblock:
Sample for bodydiv

This set of information is reusable as a group.

Lists of three contain three items.

  • This is one item.
  • This is another item.
  • This is the third item.

This concludes my topic.
